div.p: Depth profile composite anomalies in the year after LM eruptions (Yr + 1). (a) Potential temperature anomaly [°C]. (b) Meridional velocity anomaly [cm s −1]. Both only shown for DJF anomalies. The transect is at the same location of SR4 /WOCE stations. The inflow and outflow regions are marked, respectively 71.5°S,11°W and 63.5°S,53°W.
